dialog.description1: In reservations of 8 people or more we will request your credit card data, as guarantee.
dialog.description2: The procedure of reservation does not imply any charge on your credit card.
dialog.description3: You will be able to modify or annul your reservation without any charge until 24 hours before it.
dialog.description4: If you annul the reservation the same day or you do not come, 25€ per person will be charged.
dialog.description5: You will be able to adjust the definitive number of diners until 6 hours before the reservation, on the contrary, 25€ will be charged for every person that does not assist.
dialog.description6: For your tranquillity, we always confirm (via email or SMS) to double-check your reservation: one of the moments of doing it and another the previous day.

confirm.title: ONLINE RESERVATION

password.label: Password
password.length: Password must be at least 8 characters

policy.description1: Basic information about protection of personal data
policy.description2: In compliance with the General Regulation of Protection of Personal Data, the interested party is informed of the following:
policy.description3: The attention of requests made by users about reservations.
policy.description4: The inclusion in the contact list.
policy.description5: The provision of services and the management of the commercial relationship.
policy.description6: Management of duplicate reservations in different restaurants.
policy.description8: Execution of a contract in which the interested party is a party.
policy.description9: The treatment is necessary for compliance with a legal obligation applicable to the controller.
policy.description10: Data transfers may be made for statistical purposes.
policy.description11: Rights Access, rectify and delete the data, request the portability of the same, oppose the treatment and request the limitation of it.
